verses.roman:
dui-jane galāgali rodana apāra
dekhi' candraśekharera ha-ila camatkāra

synonyms: dui-jane—the two persons; galāgali—shoulder to shoulder; rodana—crying; apāra—unlimited; dekhi'-seeing; candraśekharera—of Candraśekhara; ha-ila—there was; camatkāra—astonishment.
translation: Shoulder to shoulder, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and Sanātana Gosvāmī began to cry unlimitedly. Candraśekhara was very astonished to see this.
